code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../apis";import{LIMIT}from"../../../constant";export var myArticles=function myArticles(author,token,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/?author=").concat(author,"&limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var favoritedArticles=function favoritedArticles(author,token,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/?favorited=").concat(author,"&limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var getProfile=function getProfile(token,username){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/profiles/").concat(username),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
